name: Ruffinton Toys
description:
pov you work in retail during a hurricane. 

a relatively short and simple game as it's my first. light spookiness but no jumpscares.

not entirely finished as it needs a few tweeks + sprite art.  ( i promise im changing the menu point eventally. eventually.)(as well as the banner).

shout out to Seaferret for coding help and help in general, as well as theGr8-8 for emotional support and general coolness.
